com.google.android.exoplayer.util

Class Ac3Util

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.util.Ac3Util

  • public final class Ac3Util
extends Object
    Utility methods for parsing AC-3 headers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getBitrate(int bufferSize, int sampleRate)
      Returns the bitrate of AC-3 audio given the size of a buffer and the sample rate.
      static MediaFormat parseAnnexFAc3Format(ParsableByteArray data)
      Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the AC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F.
      static MediaFormat parseAnnexFEAc3Format(ParsableByteArray data)
      Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the EC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F.
      static MediaFormat parseFrameAc3Format(ParsableBitArray data)
      Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the frame header starting from the sync word.
      static int parseFrameSize(ParsableBitArray data)
      Returns the AC-3 frame size in bytes given data containing the frame header starting from the sync word.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • parseAnnexFAc3Format

        public static MediaFormat parseAnnexFAc3Format(ParsableByteArray data)
        Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the AC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F.

      • parseAnnexFEAc3Format

        public static MediaFormat parseAnnexFEAc3Format(ParsableByteArray data)
        Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the EC3SpecificBox according to ETSI TS 102 366 Annex F.

      • parseFrameAc3Format

        public static MediaFormat parseFrameAc3Format(ParsableBitArray data)
        Returns the AC-3 format given data containing the frame header starting from the sync word.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to parse, positioned at the start of the syncword.
        Returns:
        AC-3 format parsed from data in the header.

      • parseFrameSize

        public static int parseFrameSize(ParsableBitArray data)
        Returns the AC-3 frame size in bytes given data containing the frame header starting from the sync word.
        Parameters:
        data - Data to parse, positioned at the start of the syncword.
        Returns:
        The frame size parsed from data in the header.

      • getBitrate

        public static int getBitrate(int bufferSize,
             int sampleRate)
        Returns the bitrate of AC-3 audio given the size of a buffer and the sample rate.
        Parameters:
        bufferSize - Size in bytes of a full buffer of samples.
        sampleRate - Sample rate in hz.
        Returns:
        Bitrate of the audio stream in kbit/s.
